com.simsilica.lemur.component

Class TextComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.lemur.component.AbstractGuiComponent
      • com.simsilica.lemur.component.TextComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColoredComponent, GuiComponent

    public class TextComponent
extends AbstractGuiComponent
implements ColoredComponent
    A component that renders a text string with a particular alignment and offset.
